name: Lonestar Resources US, Inc.
description: Lonestar Resources US, Inc. is an emerging exploration and production company focused on the acquisition and development of oil and natural gas properties in the United States. Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Fort Worth, Texas, Lonestar has built a robust portfolio primarily in the Eagle Ford Shale region of South Texas, one of the most prolific oil producing areas in the country. The company employs advanced technologies and innovative drilling techniques to optimize production and enhance operational efficiency. Lonestar is committed to sustainable practices and aims to minimize its environmental impact while delivering value to its shareholders. As part of its growth strategy, Lonestar actively seeks strategic acquisitions and partnerships to expand its resource base and production capabilities. The company’s mission is to leverage its technical expertise and operational excellence to become a leading player in the U.S. oil and gas sector, while maintaining a strong focus on safety and environmental stewardship.
ceo: Frank J. C. T. A. H. M. M. V. C. K. Delgrosso

key_executives.name: Frank J. C. T. A. H. M. M. V. C. K. Delgrosso

seo.meta_title: Lonestar Resources US, Inc. | Oil and Natural Gas Exploration
seo.meta_description: Explore Lonestar Resources US, Inc., a growing oil and gas exploration company focused on the Eagle Ford Shale. Learn about its commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What does Lonestar Resources focus on?
faq.answer: Lonestar Resources focuses on the exploration and production of oil and natural gas properties in the United States.

faq.question: Where is Lonestar Resources headquartered?
faq.answer: Lonestar Resources is headquartered in Fort Worth, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What regions does Lonestar operate in?
faq.answer: Lonestar primarily operates in the Eagle Ford Shale region of South Texas.
